title: My League of Legends just stops working
body: So for about 4 games in a row now. Once the timer hits 40 minutes my game just stops working. Champions start stuttering and its like i have 900 ping, but in game it says i have 50-90. Has this happened to anyone else or is this just an issue that's happening to me.

replies.body:
It sounds like you're hitting a point where high packet buffer and loss is occurring. Most of the time, this is caused by local network settings that prevent the client from maintaining a solid link to the server. I suggest taking a look at our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the most common solutions.

Let me know if this issue persists.
